Home.heroTitle1: Your Smart Assistant for Employment Contracts
Home.heroDesc: Daleel reads your contract, highlights key clauses, and answers your questions using the contract text and Saudi Labor Law evidence.
Home.featuresDesc: Simple services to help you understand your contract quickly and confidently
Home.f1Desc: Upload a PDF or DOCX to split it into clauses and prepare it for Q&A and summaries.
Home.f2Desc: Ask about any clause and get an answer grounded in the contract and Saudi Labor Law.
Home.f3Desc: Get a full summary or a focused summary by topic (salary, probation, termination, etc.).
Home.f4Desc: Ask about contracts and Saudi Labor Law without uploading a contract.
Home.trust3: Disclaimer: Outputs are informational and not legally binding advice

Upload.title: Upload Your Contract
Upload.subtitle: Upload the contract file (PDF or DOCX) so Daleel can split it into clauses and prepare it for Q&A and summaries.
Upload.cardDesc: Supports Arabic and English. The contract language will be detected automatically after upload.
Upload.dropTitle: Drop your file here or choose from your device
Upload.dropHint: We accept PDF and DOCX. Make sure the text is clear for best results.
Upload.progressHint: A progress bar will appear while uploading.
Upload.invalidType: Unsupported file type. Please upload PDF or DOCX only.
Upload.step1Desc: Upload an employment contract in PDF or DOCX format.
Upload.step2Desc: The system splits the contract into searchable clauses.
Upload.step3Desc: Ask, summarize, or verify clauses with evidence-based sources.
Upload.side1: Answers are based on the contract text and system sources
Upload.side3: Disclaimer: Outputs are informational and not legally binding advice
Upload.tipDesc: If your contract is an image (scanned), convert it to text for better extraction.

QA.title: Contract Q&A
QA.subtitle: Ask about any clause and get an evidence-based answer from the contract and Saudi Labor Law.
QA.panelHint: Type your question about the uploaded contract
QA.enterHint: Enter to send • Shift+Enter for a new line
QA.quick3: What are the termination and notice terms?
QA.emptyDesc: Try a quick question above or type your question below.
QA.noContract: No contract found. Please upload a contract first from the Upload page.
QA.hint1: Answers are grounded in the contract text
QA.hint2: Mention the topic/clause for more accurate results
QA.side1: Ask a specific and clear question
QA.side3: Outputs are informational and not legal advice
QA.tipDesc: If the contract is scanned as an image, extraction accuracy may be lower.
QA.sourcesDesc: Coming soon: We will show the clauses and references used for the answer.

Summary.title: Contract Summary
Summary.subtitle: Generate a clear, structured summary of the employment contract with evidence-based citations.
Summary.cardDesc: Choose summary type and (if needed) topics, then generate the summary.
Summary.topicsDesc: Choose the clauses you want to focus on in the summary.
Summary.topicsHint: Please select at least one topic
Summary.emptyDesc: Choose settings and click "Generate summary" to see the result here.
Summary.needUpload: Please upload a contract before generating a summary.
Summary.side1: The summary is based only on the contract text and Saudi Labor Law evidence
Summary.side2: Each bullet is cited with its source
Summary.side3: Disclaimer: Outputs are informational and not legal advice
Summary.tipDesc: Use Focused summary when you want specific information quickly.

General.title: General Chat
General.subtitle: Ask about Saudi Labor Law and employment contracts without uploading a contract.
General.cardDesc: Type your question. We will answer using evidence when available.
General.hintKeys: Enter to send • Shift+Enter for a new line
General.emptyDesc: Try one of the quick questions above, or type your own.
General.quick1: What is the probation period in Saudi labor law?
General.quick2: When can an employer terminate the contract?
General.quick4: What are the annual leave rights?
General.side1: General chat uses labor law evidence (no uploaded contract).
General.side2: Details may differ by contract type and sector.
General.side3: Disclaimer: This is informational, not binding legal advice.
General.tipDesc: Ask a specific question (e.g., notice period, overtime, leave, EOSB).
